Spells:
Animal Friendship (D1 Ench): R30' Target beast convinced of good intent (Wis neg) for 1 dy
Antilife Shell (D5 Abju): 10' radius prevents creature passage for conc or 1 hr
Beast Sense (D2 Divi): Self perceives through touched beast's senses for conc or 1 hr
Conjure Fey (D6 Conj): R90' Summons obedient fey for conc or 1 hr
Control Water (D4 Tran): R300' 100' water rises 20', parts, redirects, or whirlpools for conc or 10 min
Darkvision (D2 Tran): Touched sees 60' in dark for 8 hr
Detect Magic (D1 Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc or 10 min
Feeblemind (D8 Ench): R150' Target suffers 4d6 HP psychic, and Cha and Int drop to 1 (Int damage only)
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R150' 10 10' cu inflicts 7d10 HP fire (Dex half)
Flame Blade (D2 Evoc): Self wields flaming blade that inflicts 3d6 HP fire and lights 10' radius
Fog Cloud (D1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc or 1 hr
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Geas (D5 Ench): R60' Target obeys command (Wis neg) for 30 dy
Grasping Vine (D4 Conj): R30' Vine pulls target 20' (Dex neg) for conc or 1 min
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc or 1 min
Ice Storm (D4 Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (Dex half)
Mass Cure Wounds (D5 Evoc): R60' 6 targets in 30' radius regain 3d8 + 1 HP
Meld Into Stone (D3 Tran): Self step into rock for 8 hr
Mending (D0 Tran): Touch repairs small tear
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Con neg)
Protection From Energy (D3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc or 1 hr
Resistance (D0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc or 1 min
Reverse Gravity (D7 Tran): R50' Items in 50' radius fall upward for conc or 1 min
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Self polymorphs for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Touched club gains +7 attacks, inflicts 1d8 HP for 1 min
Thunderwave (D1 Evoc): 15' cu inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Con half, no push)
Transport Via Plants (D6 Conj): Creates teleportation door between two plants for 1 rd
Wind Wall (D3 Evoc): R120' 50'x15' area inflicts 3d8 HP bludgeoning (Str half) for conc or 1 min
Magic Notes:
Archdruid: Unlimited Wild Shape
Elf Cantrip: Learn 1 Wizard cantrip
Beast Spells: Cast spells during Wild Shape
Blighted Shape: Wild Shape gives +2 AC and 60' darkvision
Call Of The Shadowseeds: May use Reaction after damage w/in Defile Ground area to summon blighted sapling to attack 6/long rest
Defile Ground: R60' 20' radius becomes difficult terrain for foes and inflicts +1d8 HP necrotic for 1 min 1/short rest
Flash Recall: Swap prepared spell 1/short rest
Foul Conjuration: Summoned creatures immune to necrotic damage, poison damage, and poisoned condition and explode in a toxic shower when killed
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Spell Sniper: Dbl attack spell range, ignore 3/4 cover, know additional attack cantrip
Wild Shape: Transform into CR 1 creature for 10 hr unlimited/short rest
